definition[0]: a trap for catching an animal, especially one that uses a wire or rope to catch the animal by its foot
example[0]: A rabbit was caught in the snare.
definition[1]: something that is intended to trick someone and get them into a difficult situation
example[1]: I didn’t want to fall into the same snare again.
definition[2]: to catch an animal by using a snare
definition[3]: to get something or someone you want in a clever way, often by deceiving other people
example[2]: She’s hoping to snare a wealthy husband.
